DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect idalopirdine ( 120 360 mg ) cardiac repolarisation healthy men .
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating Effect Idalopirdine Cardiac Repolarisation Healthy Men
DOC.criteria: Body weight least 50 kg Body Mass index > 18.5 < 30 kg/m2 Good general health ascertain detailed medical history , laboratory test physical examination Use contraception . The subject evidence cardiac conduction abnormality calculate ECG equipment evaluate investigator , Screening Visit Baseline visit The subject history long QT syndrome , history cardiac arrhythmia , history cardiac disease ( eg , coronary artery disease , valvular disease , etc. ) . Other protocol define inclusion exclusion criterion apply
